verses.name: Ezekiel 29:9
verses.text: And the land of Egypt shall be desolate and waste; and they shall know that I am the Lord: because he hath said, The river is mine, and I have made it.

verses.name: Ezekiel 29:10
verses.text: Behold, therefore I am against thee, and against thy rivers, and I will make the land of Egypt utterly waste and desolate, from the tower of Syene even unto the border of Ethiopia.

verses.name: Ezekiel 29:11
verses.text: No foot of man shall pass through it, nor foot of beast shall pass through it, neither shall it be inhabited forty years.
